citations.narrative:
There is an accumulation of items that are deemed trash but currently left along the outer fencing to the enclosures.
Premises must be kept clean and accumulations of trash shall be placed in designated areas and cleared as necessary to
protect the health of the animals. This needs to be addressed to promote good housekeeping around the primary
enclosures.
Correct by: Aug 29, 2022
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.131(c) 
   
Sanitation. 
There is an accumulation of items that are deemed trash but currently left along the outer fencing to the enclosures. 
Premises must be kept clean and accumulations of trash shall be placed in designated areas and cleared as necessary to 
protect the health of the animals. This needs to be addressed to promote good housekeeping around the primary 
enclosures. 
 
Correct by: Aug 29, 2022 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with  the licensee. 
 
 n
